participant_1.background:
I visit craft websites to learn about new sewing projects and video game websites to find new games to play.
I'm a strong woman who can handle anything life throws my way.
I like to learn about the world, but I do not always listen to my doctor.
I love spending time outdoors, whether I'm taking pictures of nature or riding my horses.
I once went to the Amazon rainforest, where I encountered a tribe that had never heard of sweet potatoes.

participant_2.background:
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, where I learned the value of hard work and perseverance.
I am a well-educated person who enjoys bowling and music.
I'm an independent person who likes my own company, but I still love my family.
I am a female in my early 20s.
I'm trying to spend as much time with my sister and Charlie as possible.

content.text: Hi there! What are you doing today?
Hey there! I am just working on a few projects. How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thanks for asking! I am planning a trip to the Amazon rainforest.
That is awesome! I have always wanted to go there. What are you looking forward to seeing there?
I am excited to see the wildlife and learn about the different cultures. I am also looking forward to trying some of the local food.
That sounds amazing! I am sure you will have a great time. Do you have any family or friends who are going with you?
I am going with my sister and her boyfriend. We are all really excited about the trip.
That is perfect! I am sure you will have a great time together.
Thanks! I am looking forward to it.
What are some of your favorite hobbies?
I love to sew and play video games. I also enjoy spending time outdoors.
That is awesome! I love to sew as well. I also enjoy playing video games and spending time outdoors.
That is great! We should talk about our favorite video games sometime.
That would be great! I am always looking for new people to play games with.
Awesome! I will add you on Facebook so we can stay in touch.
Great! I look forward to hearing from you
